analysis.description:
Reentrancy in TokenVestingPool.addBeneficiary (/unique_chucks/25/0x7e89ead48b71baf0b6ef43b479bc8addd5093e34.sol#403-443):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(address(this)) >= _amount) (/unique_chucks/25/0x7e89ead48b71baf0b6ef43b479bc8addd5093e34.sol#419-421)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- distributedTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0x7e89ead48b71baf0b6ef43b479bc8addd5093e34.sol#425-426)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.release (/unique_chucks/25/0x7e89ead48b71baf0b6ef43b479bc8addd5093e34.sol#260-268):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(_token) (/unique_chucks/25/0x7e89ead48b71baf0b6ef43b479bc8addd5093e34.sol#264)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_chucks/25/0x7e89ead48b71baf0b6ef43b479bc8addd5093e34.sol#265-266)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_chucks/25/0x7e89ead48b71baf0b6ef43b479bc8addd5093e34.sol#277-289):
	External calls:
	- balance = _token.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/25/0x7e89ead48b71baf0b6ef43b479bc8addd5093e34.sol#285)
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(_token) (/unique_chucks/25/0x7e89ead48b71baf0b6ef43b479bc8addd5093e34.sol#285-286)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_chucks/25/0x7e89ead48b71baf0b6ef43b479bc8addd5093e34.sol#288)

Reentrancy in TokenVestingPool.addBeneficiary (/unique_chucks/25/0x7e89ead48b71baf0b6ef43b479bc8addd5093e34.sol#403-443):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(address(this)) >= _amount) (/unique_chucks/25/0x7e89ead48b71baf0b6ef43b479bc8addd5093e34.sol#419-421)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- beneficiaries (/unique_chucks/25/0x7e89ead48b71baf0b6ef43b479bc8addd5093e34.sol#422-423)
	- beneficiaryDistributionContracts (/unique_chucks/25/0x7e89ead48b71baf0b6ef43b479bc8addd5093e34.sol#434-435)
	- distributionContracts (/unique_chucks/25/0x7e89ead48b71baf0b6ef43b479bc8addd5093e34.sol#435-437)

TokenVesting.vestedAmount (/unique_chucks/25/0x7e89ead48b71baf0b6ef43b479bc8addd5093e34.sol#302-321) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < cliff (/unique_chucks/25/0x7e89ead48b71baf0b6ef43b479bc8addd5093e34.sol#311-321)
	- block.timestamp >= start.add(duration) || revoked[_token] (/unique_chucks/25/0x7e89ead48b71baf0b6ef43b479bc8addd5093e34.sol#314-321)
